rubric.whatMakesGoodPrompt: What makes a good prompt? See the scoring rubric
rubric.rubricIntro: When you click "Get Feedback", your prompt will be evaluated against these five dimensions. Each is scored from 1 to 5. Understanding these criteria will help you write better prompts.
rubric.rubricFooter: Aim for a score of 4 or higher on each dimension. The AI will also suggest an improved version of your prompt that you can learn from.
